author: Nate Raymond
title: Supreme Court seeks DOJ view on Gilead whistleblower case
text:
The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday asked the solicitor general to weigh in on whether to grant review in a case involving Gilead Sciences Inc to consider what constitutes a material misrepresentation by companies submitting claims to the government for payment.
The Supreme Courtâ€™s order came in a whistleblower lawsuit accusing Gilead of making false statements about its compliance with federal regulations in connection with HIV drugs it makes.
